function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 spreads easily and infected individuals may not show symptoms for 1-14 days.","Impact":"High risk of widespread transmission if people continue to work and study in close proximity.","Mitigation":"Implement work from home and distance learning strategies to reduce close contact.","Technologies":"Video conferencing, encryption, firewall software, e-learning platforms.","People":"Employees, students, general population.","Owner":"Companies, educational institutions, government."}]}
